display_long_description:
Live your fashion retail dream in immersive virtual reality with Fashion Store Simulator Game, the ultimate VR clothing store management experience on Meta Quest!

Take full control as a store owner — design your boutique layout, decorate with stylish elements, stock trending outfits, and serve fashion-savvy customers. Whether you're dressing mannequins, scanning purchases, or setting up seasonal collections, every task is interactive and hands-on.

Start with a small shop and grow it into a booming fashion brand. Balance creativity with business strategy: set prices, restock shelves, handle customer demands, manage rush-hour chaos, and respond to the latest fashion trends. Your decisions directly impact your store’s success and reputation.

Unlock premium outfits, expand your space, attract VIP clients, and climb the ladder of retail success. The game blends the fun of a tycoon simulator with the glamor of a fashion boutique — all powered by VR.

🛍️ Build your dream store
🧥 Style real-time customers
📈 Grow and manage your fashion empire
🎯 Experience full interactivity with VR mechanics

Perfect for fans of business simulators, clothing games, shop tycoons, and anyone who’s ever dreamed of running their own fashion store in virtual reality.
